oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas A. Frazier, Adjutant General of Tennessee, 1939 July
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thomas A. Frazier, the Adjutant General of Tennessee. Frazier served in office from 1939-1945, during the administration of Governor Prentice Cooper. During World War II, the Tennessee State Guard was commanded by Major General Thomas A. Frazier, state adjutant general, organized into three divisions located in West, Middle, and East Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Frazier, Thomas A.
